reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 282/07: PRESCRIBED LEGISLATION: MONETARY PENALTIES UNDER SECTION 14.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: prescribed legislation: monetary penalties under section 14.1 of the Act
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 282/07: PRESCRIBED LEGISLATION: MONETARY PENALTIES UNDER SECTION 14.1 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Alcohol and Gaming Regulation and Public Protection Act, 1996   Loi de 1996 sur la réglementation des alcools et des jeux et la protection du public

content.content: 1. (1) The following are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the Act: 1.  Gaming Control Act, 1992. 1.1  Revoked: O. Reg. 79/12, s. 1 (2). 1.2 Ontario Regulation 78/12 (General) made under the Gaming Control Act, 1992. 2.  Liquor Licence Act. 3. The following regulations made under the Liquor Licence Act: i. Ontario Regulation 58/00 (Ferment on Premise Facilities), ii. Regulation 718 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (General), iii. Regulation 719 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Licences to Sell Liquor), iv. Regulation 720 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Manufacturers’ Licences), v. Ontario Regulation 389/91 (Special Occasion Permits).  O. Reg. 282/07, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 12/08, s. 1; O. Reg. 183/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 79/12, ss 1. (2) Revoked:  O. Reg. 282/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The following are prescribed for the purposes of subsection 14.1 (1) of the Act:

1. Gaming Control Act, 1992.

1.1 Revoked: O. Reg. 79/12, s. 1 (2).

1.2 Ontario Regulation 78/12 (General) made under the Gaming Control Act, 1992.

2. Liquor Licence Act.

3. The following regulations made under the Liquor Licence Act:

i. Ontario Regulation 58/00 (Ferment on Premise Facilities),

ii. Regulation 718 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (General),

iii. Regulation 719 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Licences to Sell Liquor),

iv. Regulation 720 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990 (Manufacturers’ Licences),

v. Ontario Regulation 389/91 (Special Occasion Permits).  O. Reg. 282/07, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 12/08, s. 1; O. Reg. 183/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 79/12, ss 1.

(2) Revoked:  O. Reg. 282/07, s. 2.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for amendments to this Regulation).  O. Reg. 282/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for amendments to this Regulation).  O. Reg. 282/07, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 282/07, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 282/07, s. 3.
